name: Demon Prince Goes to the Academy
thoughts: Fucking incredible. I still remember this shit to this day.

name: A Villain's Way to Live
thoughts: It's fine, I wanted to read more but didn't have the time. Kinda jsut got bored of it too.

name: I Killed the Academy Player
thoughts: Pretty good, though I don't get why they had to make Marie homophobic HAHAHAH. Anyway, I need to keep reading to form a proper rating.
